chat.Name: httpTopic
chat.send:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!ELEMENT publishers (publisher)*>
<!ELEMENT publisher (topic)*> <!ATTLIST publisher Name CDATA #REQUIRED>
<!ELEMENT topic (type)*> <!ATTLIST topic Name CDATA #REQUIRED>
<!ELEMENT type (key)+> <!ATTLIST type Name CDATA #REQUIRED>
<!ELEMENT key EMPTY> <!ATTLIST key Field CDATA "localID">
